text: @EricTrump You mean the 401k's that turned into 010k's because of your fathers handling of the Covid-19 pandemic?  The denial, lies, and betrayal of you and your family is so ostentatious. Stop with your idiocy. How many people that lost their jobs or life do you think have 401k's? SYFM!
